sub_title: Director | Head of Product | IoT Development | Innovation | App | Product Marketing | AI | Digital Transformation
summary:
I am an experienced leader (+20 years) in innovation and digital domain, including 13 in audio and video leading teams that created successful apps and IoT (Internet of Things) devices including marketing and business strategies.  

International outlook, having worked in Asia, North America and Europe. Consumer driven, fast in analysis and decisions and hands-on attitude. Leading diverse project teams with agile methodology. I love to venture the unknown, 'fuzzy front-end' and emerging spaces to create new propositions. 

Career highlights: 
- Designed and implemented new IoT platform within Philips (more than 1 million connected devices), saving 5 million Euro 
- Led development and launch of Philips Air+ app with : 1.5 million downloads, 1 million users with 50% YoY growth rate, 4.5 star review 
- Created multiple app enabled propositions that are sold in Apple Stores with turnover of 50 million in first 3 years
- Set-up and led Philips D2C platform in China with more than 5 million euro turn over in first year

contributors.headline: Director | Head of Product | IoT Development | Innovation | App | Product Marketing | AI | Digital Transformation

profile_positions.description:
Set-up and management of global team to create and manage connected platform for a portfolio of connected devices including apps, chipsets, cloud services and data analytics platforms.
•	Leading development and launch of Philips Air+ app with 4.5 star rating, +1Million users since 2020, and monetization of +5 million euro in first year through replenishment sales
•	Lead creation and deployment of IoT cloud platform within Philips for connected devices: 1million + connected devices including Philips Air Purifiers, Robot Vacuum Cleaners, Toothbrushes, Shavers
•	Lead development of industry first artificial intelligence (AI) in Philips Air purifiers, improving product performance
•	Set-up data driven product team with owners, designs, app and cloud developers, data analytics team
•	In China, set-up and lead team to launch Philips China Home+ platform in 2020, a direct-to-consumer driven platform with app, e-store, connected devices, loyalty, and consumer care
•	Lead data analytics team including algorithm development to optimize performance of IoT devices
•	Integration of voice Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant, Apple HomeKit, IFTTT
•	Partnership development and integration (respiratory digital services, B2B and ecosystem partners)
profile_positions.title: App and IoT (Internet of Things) Director

profile_positions.description: Responsible for creating digital health solutions in the respiratory space (pollution prevention, allergies and asthma). Enabling Philips hardware (like air purifiers) to work with leading apps and platforms. Creating digital health programs to reduce respiratory health issues.
profile_positions.title: Digital Director

profile_positions.description: Product Director for App enabled accessories. Responsible for creation and marketing of large range of app enabled accessories products that work with Apple and Android phones and tablets.
profile_positions.title: Director Consumer Marketing - App enabled accessories

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for providing insights and knowledge for product innovations, strategic and marketing directions for BU Audio, Video and Multimedia, including Managing Team & Research Budget, Consumer Insights, Concepts Development, Demand Modeling, Segmentation, Retail Audits, Developing Marketing Strategies: 
•Team leader of Singapore and Hong Kong for consumer researchers & business analysts with global coverage
•Contribute to business growth by providing actionable consumer and market knowledge to support strategy and innovation, marketing planning and channel development
•Overseeing all global consumer research projects; providing expertise in both qualitative and quantitative research and translating results to business actions
•Demand & Pricing global forecasting for BU diverse audio & video product portfolio and adjacent categories
•Provide clear directions for business improvement by monitoring the position of brand, sales, product and service 
•Retail audit analysis & reporting for over 1 billion sales of electronics worldwide
profile_positions.title: Senior Manager Marketing Intelligence Singapore & Hong Kong

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for Marketing Intelligence in BU Video Multimedia (VM):
- Set-up new organization for Singapore Marketing Intelligence department in BU Video
-Planning and moderating innovation sessions for new product development
- All Marketing intelligence related responsibilities:providing consumer insights and knowledge for product innovations, strategic and marketing directions on global level for video products
profile_positions.title: Manager Marketing Intelligence Singapore

profile_positions.description:
•Managing New Products Consumer research for Home Entertainment Propositions including segmentation, insight generation, proposition creation, propositioing refinement, demand forecasting, etc.
•Project leader for consumer research activities for the FiFa World Cup Sponsorship project
•Member of the consumer electronics strategy group
profile_positions.title: Consumer Research Manager

profile_positions.description:
•Support the BU Video Systems with consumer and market development information
•Setting up regional Consumer & Market research support to Latin America
profile_positions.title: Senior Market Analyst

profile_positions.description: •Consolidating, analyzing, modeling and reporting of short and long term information concerning markets and shares for Video and Disc Systems
